dt-option.name: searchBuilder.logic

type.description: The value for the default logic operator for groups, either `AND` or `OR`.

dt-option.description:
This option is an alias to `-feature searchBuilder.logic`, which should be preferred when using DataTables 2+. It can be used to configure SearchBuilder regardless of how the panes are inserted into the document (`-init layout` or `-button searchBuilder`).
Please refer to the documentation for `-feature searchBuilder.logic` for full details of this option.
